layer.name: Discipline
layer.definition: Do what needs doing, especially when you don't feel like it.

answers.4: mostly focused on what matters, though I get distracted sometimes
answers.5: intentional — I learn what I need for what I'm building
answers.2: scattered — I follow whatever interests me in the moment
answers.3: partly focused — some is useful, some is just curiosity
answers.1: passive — I absorb whatever comes my way

questions.text: Setting aside time to actually think is ...

answers.4: regular, though I skip it when busy
answers.5: protected — I don't just consume, I process
answers.2: something I intend but rarely make time for
answers.3: inconsistent — sometimes I do, often I don't
answers.1: not something I do — I just consume

questions.text: When I need to think deeply, distractions are ...

answers.5: eliminated — phone goes away, notifications off, door closed
answers.2: always available — I keep notifications on 'just in case'
answers.3: sometimes blocked, but they often creep in
answers.1: constant — I've stopped trying to control them

questions.text: When I encounter ideas that challenge my thinking, I ...

answers.4: usually engage, though I avoid some topics
answers.5: always engage — I don't let discomfort stop me

questions.text: When I learn something new, I ...

answers.4: apply it, though not always right away
answers.5: apply it before I move on
answers.3: find something useful to take away (though I usually forget it quickly)
answers.1: move on to the next thing
